com.eco.bio7.batch

Class Bio7Flow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eco.bio7.batch.Bio7Flow

  • public class Bio7Flow
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some methods for the use in the Bio7 flow editor.
    Author:
    Bio7

        Pauses for the defined milliseconds.
        Parameters:

      • runTo

        public static void runTo(int count)
        Starts the calculation thread and runs to the specified count. Works as long as a flow is not cancelled.
        Parameters:
        count - the count value at which the calculation thread stops.

      • openFolder

        public static void openFolder(boolean value)
        Opens the specified folder in the Bio7 flow if set to true. If this value is set to false no external application will be executed!
        Parameters:
        value -

      • getFolder

        public static java.lang.String getFolder()
        Returns the path of the folder in the Bio7 flow.
        Returns:
        a string representation of the path.

        Parameters:
        directory -
